info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued June 3 at 6:28PM MST until June 3 at 9:30PM MST by NWS Flagstaff AZ
info.description:
FFWFGZ
The National Weather Service in Flagstaff has issued a
* Flash Flood Warning for... Southern Coconino County in north central Arizona... Eastern Yavapai County in west central Arizona...
* Until 930 PM MST.
* At 628 PM MST, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain along West Clear Creek and Wet Beaver Creek. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain have fallen. Additional rainfall amounts up to 1 inch are possible in the warned area. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly.
HAZARD...Life-threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding.
SOURCE...Radar.
IMPACT...Life-threatening flash flooding of low-water crossings, creeks, normally dry washes and roads.
* Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Indian Maiden Falls, Wet Beaver Wilderness, Hanging Garden, Bell Crossing/The Crack, Wet Beaver Creek Day Use Area, V Bar V Heritage Site, Bullpen Day Use Area, V Bar V Visitors Center and Wet Beaver Creek Campground.
info.instruction:
Remain alert for flooding even in locations not receiving rain. Normally dry washes, slot canyons, and creeks can become raging killer currents in a matter of minutes, even from distant rainfall.
Get out of washes and creeks if you are camping or hiking! Flooding is occurring or imminent and will inundate creeks and washes.

parameter.value: NWS: FLASH FLOOD WARNING this area til 9:30 PM MST. Avoid flooded areas.

National Weather Service: A FLASH FLOOD WARNING is in effect for this area until 9:30 PM MST. This is a dangerous and life-threatening situation. Do not attempt to travel unless you are fleeing an area subject to flooding or under an evacuation order.

parameter.value: SNM: AVISO DE INUNDACIONES REPENTINAS hasta 9:30 PM MST. Evite areas inundadas.

Servicio Nacional de Meteorologia: AVISO DE INUNDACIONES REPENTINAS en efecto para esta area hasta las 9:30 PM MST. Esta es una situacion peligrosa y amenaza la vida. No intente viajar a menos que sea para abandonar un area propensa a inundaciones o bajo una orden de desalojo.
